info.name: Minds.com CSharpner Dark
info.description: Provides a nice, clean dark theme for Minds.com, updated to support their new UI changes they released in late January 2019.
info.additionalInfo:
This is derived from https://userstyles.org/styles/163384/minds-com-night-watch-v1-2 with extra additions put in for many items that were still left white and getting rid of the bright-white borders around most things.

[Update 2019-04-04b]
Dialed back text brightness in comment text entry.

[Update 2019-04-04]
Fixed recent changes in group chat.

[Update 2019-03-29]
New "Notices" panel on right darkened.

[Update 2019-03-20]
Login page updated.

[Update 2019-03-18]
Big UI changes on the site.  Dark theme updated to handle them.

[Update 2019-03-16]
Mature warning on profile page darkened.

[Update 2019-03-10]
White lines between suggested channels (upper-right on main stream) are now dark.
Same with lines on menu on individual posts.

[Update 2019-03-03]
City color fixed in profile page.

[Update 2019-02-24]
Search results - link bar
Search results - Headers for "CHANNELS" & "POSTS"

[Update 2019-02-19b]
Boost popup properly darkened.

[Update 2019-02-19]
"Complete your profile" popup fixed.

[Update 2019-02-16d]
Darkened the Minds PLUS page.

[Update 2019-02-16c]
Suggested Channels panel darkened.

[Update 2019-02-16b]
The website updated their menu attached to your profile icon in the upper right, making it light again.  I've updated the theme to accommodate the change to keep it dark.

[Update 2019-02-16]
Your boosts - Icons below each boost post.
Write a block side-bar background
Your post is awaiting moderation - panel

[Update 2019-02-09b]
Terms page fixed.
Search bar background dark.

[Update 2019-02-12]
Settings page darkened. (Thanks Luculent for pointing it out)
Icons on private messenger darkened.]

[Update 2019-02-09]
Darkened the FAQ page (Thanks Luculent for pointing it out)

[Update 2019-02-08]
Fixed pinned post badge color.
